reporting-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

title.narrative: ICRC operations by the Nigeria Delegation(2020 Unaudited)

description.narrative: In Nigeria, the ICRC helps people affected by armed conflict and violence, particularly in the north-east, the Middle Belt and the Niger Delta states. We promote IHL and other rules that protect people during armed violence and we support the emergency-response work of the Nigerian Red Cross.

participating-org.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross

organisation.narrative: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)

mailing-address.narrative: 19 Avenue de la paix, 1202 Geneva, Switzerland
